hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"Nabidh of raisins would be made for the Messenger of Allah [SAW] at night, and he would put it in a water skin and drink it during the next day, the day after, and the day after that. At the end of the third day, he would give it to others to drink, or drink it himself, and if anything was left the following morning, he would pour it away

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الأَنْبِذَةِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: Kinds of Nabidh that are Permissible to Drink and the Kinds that are Not
